temporary access card that you've received on your first working day must be replaced with a permanent one. A permanent E-card will be sent to your office via mail (you will be additionally notified by the office manager).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please do not lose your E-card or give it to colleagues or unauthorized persons!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security
